original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not currently hold a Temporary title
§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not currently hold a Temporary title
There's an infidel at your court, my liege!', my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] said.\n'I demand you burn the infidel at the stake!'
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][From.GetTitledFirstName]说：「领主，宫廷里有异教徒！」\n「我要求你将他绑上火刑柱！」

original: There's an infidel at your court, my liege!', my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] said.\n'I demand you banish the infidel!'
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][From.GetTitledFirstName]说：「领主，宫廷里有异教徒！」\n「我要求你将他驱逐出去！」

original: My liege, you have a heretic in your court!', my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me in confidence.\n'I recommend you set an example and burn the heretic on the stake!'
translation: [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][From.GetTitledFirstName]悄悄告诉我：「我的领主，宫廷里有异端！」\n「我认为你最好将他处以火刑，以儆效尤！」

original: Cannot Revoke as this Title has no Holder.
Muslims can get rid of the Decadent trait by going on the Hajj to Mecca.
translation: 穆斯林可以去麦加朝觐，以摆脱腐化特质。

original: §RCannot Usurp the sole primary title off a ruler of another religion who still holds land within it.§!
translation: §R当异教角色仍拥有头衔法理领地，且该头衔是其唯一的主头衔时无法篡夺。§!

original: Rulers of the Indian religions can subjugate each other for §Y500§! Karma if they are from the same culture group.
translation: 印度宗教领主可以以§Y500§!善业为代价向同文化组领主发动征服战争。

original: Hinduism is not a single religion so much as a blanket term for the successor faiths of ancient Indian polytheism as recorded in the Vedas. The existence of many different sects within Hinduism - as well as millennia of relatively peaceful co-existence with Jainism and Buddhism - has made the Hindu faith remarkably tolerant and pluralistic toward all Indian religions. Still, it is the most warlike of the three.
translation: 印度教不完全是单一宗教，而是吠陀经中所载的古印度多神教诸多继任信仰的总称。印度教中许多不同教派的存在——以及其与耆那教和佛教相对和平地千年共存——已经使印度教对所有印度信仰特别宽容和多元。尽管如此，它是三个宗教中最好战的。

original: Soft living and flagrant debauchery has turned this character decadent, a living offense to all righteous Muslims. Decadent characters will slowly increase the decadence value of their entire dynasty, which can eventually lead to massive tribal uprisings.
translation: 高床软枕的生活令人沈缅逸乐之中，生活腐化会招致虔诚穆斯林敌视，更会败坏家族的名声，最终可能引发暴动，地方部落起兵推翻腐化的统治家族。

original: This character is widely believed to be a reincarnation of [Reincarnation.GetBestName].
translation: 大家都认为他是[Reincarnation.GetBestName]的转世。

original: I had the spice merchant beaten for the contemptuous look he gave me. Apparently, there are many who think I have grown soft and decadent, lost to vices and indulging in haram!
translation: 香料商人的白眼把我震住了！显然人人都认为我是个养尊处优的废人，惯于享乐而溺于罪途！！
喂！唱歌的，给我换首好听点的歌！

original: My [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetBestName] has let me know that my sinful living shames the entire dynasty. [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] is exerting [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] influence to shield House [Root.GetDynName], but strongly urges me to seek guidance in the perfect example set by the Prophet (peace be upon him.)
translation: 我的[GetFromFromRelation][FromFrom.GetBestName]对我晓以大义，我终于理解到我堕落的生活已令整个家族蒙羞。[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]用[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]影响力守护着整个[Root.GetDynName]家族，就像是先知（愿他安息）早已安排好的一个完美模范，敦促我去追随，去践行。

original: How rude! My life is my own.
I will try, with the help of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

My decadent [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] refuses to change [From.GetPossPronoun] sinful ways. I can declare [From.GetObjectPronoun] a kafir, which will give me a reason to imprison the degenerate... unless there is another way to get through to [From.GetObjectPronoun].
translation: 我那堕落的[GetFromRelation][From.GetBestName]拒绝放弃[From.GetPossPronoun]罪恶生活。我可以宣布[From.GetObjectPronoun]是一个叛教者，那我就可以名正言顺将他关起来……除非还有其他办法解决[From.GetObjectPronoun]的问题。

original: I am a better negotiator than this!
I must save [From.GetPossPronoun] soul from the fires of Jahannam!
translation: 我一定要将[From.GetPossPronoun]灵魂从火狱中拯救出来！
是时候采用一些……特殊手段。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] understands that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is living a life of haram, and has ensured me that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is committed to changing [From.GetPossPronoun] ways.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetBestName]终于明白[From.GetSubjectPronoun]生活得如此颓废，并向我保证[From.GetSubjectPronoun]从此洗心革面，回归[From.GetPossPronoun]正轨。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] just will not give up. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] makes some most persuasive arguments about why I need to overcome my forbidden, haram, desires. For the sake of my soul, my dynasty and my religion, I need to repent.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]没有就此罢休。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]不断要教我教人，要我洁身自爱。因我灵，我族，我主之名，我必须有所回应。

original: I know I am weak. Too weak!
Though it's hard, I shall walk the narrow path.
translation: 无论如何，我都要走过这窄门。

original: I just cannot get through to my wastrel [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is simply too weak and obstinate.
translation: 我真是没法打救我那颓废的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]！[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]实在又软弱又昏庸，根本是没救了！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] understands that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is living a life of haram, and has ensured me that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is committed to changing [From.GetPossPronoun] ways.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetBestName]终于明白[From.GetSubjectPronoun]生活得如此颓废，并向我保证[From.GetSubjectPronoun]从此洗心革面，回归[From.GetPossPronoun]正轨。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is back to persuade my to abandon my forbidden, haram, desires. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] quotes the Koran and the Hadiths like a mufti and threatens me with the fires of Jehennom in the afterlife...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]劝说我摒弃犯禁，远离罪行。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]就像一个穆夫提一样引用古兰经和圣训的经文，警告我来世会因宣淫犯禁而堕入地狱的烈火中……

original: Do I look like a believer?
translation: 我看起来是个善男信女吗？
我要加入拜克塔什教团苦修！
我要加入阿萨辛派赎罪！

original: I must go on the Hajj to Mecca!
I will donate money to charity!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] was moved to tears by my fiery exhortations. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] will join a holy order in order to serve Allah best!
translation: 我殷切的教诲终于感化我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]决定要加入教团，以便待奉安拉！

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] was moved to tears by my fiery exhortations and left immediately for the holy pilgrimage to Mecca - the Hajj.
translation: 我殷切的教诲终于感化我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]，他决定马上出发到麦加朝觐，净化心灵。

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] was shaken by the strength of my pious arguments and promised to reform [From.GetPossPronoun] ways, starting with a generous donation to charity.
translation: 我坚定的信仰感化了我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]。对方不但洗心革面，更成为慷慨的大慈善家。

original: I woke up to a dreadful stench and found my room full of the rotting carcasses of dogs and pigs. As I staggered out through the door, a shadowy figure crept up from behind and held a knife to my throat, whispering 'This is what your life is like. Imagine your death...' before disappearing without a trace!
translation: 一股恶臭令我从睡梦中惊醒，我发现房间里堆满了猪和狗的腐尸。当我恍惚地步出房门，一个阴影窜出，一刀抵住我的喉咙，轻语道：「这就是你生活的真实模样，感受死亡的可怕吧……」说完然后就消失得无影无踪！

original: Maybe I had better shape up...
This is just too much. Life is not worth living!
translation: 这太过份了，人不是这样活的！

original: I arranged a very unpleasant 'awakening' for my decadent [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName], but [From.GetSubjectPronoun] remains stubbornly committed to [From.GetPossPronoun] hedonism, bringing shame on our House.
translation: 我给[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]安排的那场不怎么好受的「觉悟活动」似乎作用不大，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]依然固我，死不悔改，仍然在过[From.GetPossPronoun]那麋烂的生活，继续令家族蒙羞。

original: The little nightmare I staged seems to have worked on my decadent [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName], who is scared witless and has promised to renounce [From.GetPossPronoun] shameful hedonism!
translation: 我给[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]安排的那场噩梦似乎奏效了，[From.GetPossPronoun]吓得要死，再也不胡作非为！

original: It seems the nighttime show I put on for my decadent [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] was a little too much. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] chose to jump from a tower rather than live a righteous life as a true Muslim!
translation: 我给[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]安排的那场噩梦似乎太刺激了。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]决定跳出清规的牢笼，一心一意背弃教门！

original: Tell [This.GetFirstName] to mind his own business!
Promise [This.GetFirstName] to lead a righteous life!
translation: 向[This.GetFirstName]保证一定会改正行为！

original: Make a better attempt at convincing [This.GetFirstName]
Present the best religious arguments to [This.GetFirstName]
Arrange for some nasty nighttime theatrics to scare [This.GetFirstName] in [From.GetPossPronoun] room
translation: 在[From.GetPossPronoun]房间给[This.GetFirstName]安排一场讨厌的夜间剧

original: Tiger hunting is not only a noble sport but also an occasion to meet your vassals to forge bonds of friendship and discuss important business.
translation: 猎虎大会不但是一种贵族风尚，更是与封臣交好的机会，也能顺便与他们讨论一下军国要事。

original: You can choose a personal patron deity from among the most powerful of the many gods and godesses of the Hindu faith. People will associate your rule with that deity and some aspects of government will be strengthened as a result, though you should be aware that this always has a cost in some other area. There are those who argue that it's best to stay neutral and anger no one.
translation: 你可以在印度众神中，选择供奉一位个人的守护神。臣民会将你与神明联想在一起，令朝廷某些方面的统治得以强化，不过这往往要付出一些代价。所以又会有人说，面面俱到，不去触怒任何一位才是明智的做法。

original: These are the three gods of the Trimurti, the Great Trinity. Perhaps I should choose one of them as my patron deity?
translation: 三相神是三位主神，我应该要供奉哪一位？
手持三叉戟，公正的湿婆。
头戴王冠，全能的毗湿奴。

original: Mighy Brahma, He of four faces.
There are other powerful deities as well...
These are all powerful gods and goddesses. Choosing one of them as my patron deity would be a testament to the power of my dynasty.
translation: 神明威力无穷，遍布宇宙。供奉其中一位，祂便会赐福于我们家族。

original: Kali, the slayer and agent of Time.
translation: 杀戮与时光女神迦梨时母。

original: Ganga of the waters, She who purifies.
On second thought, I shall associate myself with one of the Trimurti...
translation: 转念一想，我还是想要供奉三相神……

original: My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has an odd birthmark that closely matches that of my [GetFromReincarnationRelation], [From.Reincarnation.GetBestName]. Could [From.Reincarnation.GetSubjectPronoun] have been reborn as my [GetFromRelation] in this life?
translation: 刚出生的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]有一块和我[GetFromReincarnationRelation][From.Reincarnation.GetBestName]一样的奇怪胎记，难道[From.Reincarnation.GetSubjectPronoun]转世成为我的[GetFromRelation]了？

original: Sometimes I think of my other family, when I was an old [Root.Reincarnation.GetManWoman]. Where are all my old friends?
translation: 有时候，我会想念以前，当我还是年老[Root.Reincarnation.GetManWoman]时的家人，还有我的老友。他们都到哪里去了？

original: I wonder how alike [From.Reincarnation.GetFirstName] [From.GetSubjectPronoun] will become...
Remarkable, but I want [From.GetObjectPronoun] raised as a new person.
translation: 无论如何，我想[From.GetObjectPronoun]应该要当好另一个人。

original: My tutors say that they see more of my [GetReincarnationRelation] [Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName] in me every day, even though my own vague memories of that past life are fading fast.
translation: 我的导师说他从我身上看到我[GetReincarnationRelation][Root.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]的影子，这些前世的零星记忆我都差不多要忘掉了。
我只是觉得……那就是我吧。

original: How remarkable is Samsara - the cycle of rebirth!
translation: 前世因缘今世果，此乃轮回奥妙处！

original: [Root.Reincarnation.Killer.GetFirstName]!' you scream as you wake up from a horrible nightmare of being killed. As your guards come rushing in, you calm down and realize that it was no ordinary dream. You remember the name of the one who had you murdered in your previous life as [Root.Reincarnation.GetBestName] - the evil [Root.Reincarnation.Killer.GetBestName]!
translation: 「[Root.Reincarnation.Killer.GetFirstName]！」你从噩梦中尖叫惊醒，在梦中你被杀死了。侍卫闻声而至，你正神一想，这并不是普通的梦，这是你前世[Root.Reincarnation.GetBestName]最后的记忆，被[Root.Reincarnation.Killer.GetBestName]杀害的记忆！

original: That vicious spawn of a Rakshasi!

As you gaze idly into the pond, a feeling of deep love suddenly comes over you, and then, the sweetest memory. You remember making love to your beloved [Root.Reincarnation.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] [Root.Reincarnation.Spouse.GetFirstName] by another pool of water, in another forest, in another life...
translation: 当你漫不经心地凝视着池塘时，深深的爱意突然充满了你的心头，你想起了那些甜蜜的记忆。你回想起与心爱的[Root.Reincarnation.Spouse.GetHusbandWife][Root.Reincarnation.Spouse.GetFirstName]做爱的场景，在另一汪池塘中，在另一片森林中，在另一场生命中……

original: Ah, [Root.Reincarnation.Spouse.GetFirstName] my love, where are you now?
The target unit must have the Same Looter status, must be either your Vassal or Ally, and it's Owner must have the Same or Greater Feudal Ranking.
translation: 目标部队必须同是劫掠状态，而且是你的封臣或盟友，他也必须拥有相等或更高的封建等级。

original: Great monarchs often employ units of war elephants in their army to great effect. But aside from that, the elephant also has great value as a symbol of stability, strength and perserverance. All this makes it very important to keep the ruler's elephants in good health, and the position of Master of the Royal Elephants is a correspondingly prestigious one.
translation: 王者常在战阵中运用战象左右战局，除此以外，大象更是国泰民安，国家富强的象征。因此，王室养象的健康变得十分重要，而王家养象人也相对成为相当有名望的职位。

original: Powerful rulers will always be expanding their palaces and building new ones. The position of Royal Builder holds much prestige, though the holder need not actually have any architectural or engineering skills. It's usually someone else doing the real work.
translation: 英武之主总爱扩建宫室，营造新殿。因此王家建筑师的职务总能带来声价，即使他对建筑是一窍不通，总会有人为他代劳的。

original: Poetry is an art much respected in Indian culture, and thus the Court Poet has always been a position of prestige.
translation: 诗歌在印度是一门备受尊敬的艺术，因此宫廷诗人也一直是一个尊贵的称号。

original: This is where the fearsome war elephants are bred and trained.
translation: 在此可以饲养和训练那些可怕的战象。

original: This is where the fearsome war elephants are bred and trained.
translation: 在此可以饲养和训练那些可怕的战象。

original: This is where the fearsome war elephants are bred and trained.
translation: 在此可以饲养和训练那些可怕的战象。

original: This is where the fearsome war elephants are bred and trained.
translation: 在此可以饲养和训练那些可怕的战象。

original: This character has mastered the tactical use of war elephants in battle.
translation: 此人精于在战斗中运用大象克敌制胜。

original: This character is an expert at leading troops in the jungle.
translation: 此人擅于在丛林中领兵作战。

original: Diwali is the traditional Indian harvest feast. It celebrates the triumph of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair.
translation: 排灯节是印度传统的丰收节。大家在排灯节上庆祝光明战胜了黑暗，善良战胜了邪恶，希望战胜了绝望。

original: Diwali is the traditional Indian harvest feast. It celebrates the triumph of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair.
translation: 排灯节是印度传统的丰收节。大家在排灯节上庆祝光明战胜了黑暗，善良战胜了邪恶，希望战胜了绝望。

original: Diwali is the traditional Indian harvest feast. It celebrates the triumph of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair. For Jains it is also a time to remember and honor Mahavira, the twenty-fourth Tirthankara.
translation: 排灯节是印度传统的丰收节。大家在排灯节上庆祝光明战胜了黑暗，善良战胜了邪恶，希望战胜了绝望。同时耆那教徒也会在排灯节纪念第二十四代祖师大雄筏驮摩那。

original: While most of India celebrates Diwali in autumn, the Kali Puja festival is celebrated in the goddess Kali's name by Hindus in parts of northeastern India, and anywhere by those who hold a special love for the goddess of Death, Time and Change.  Rituals in Kali's honor often involve things such as blood and skulls.
translation: 当印度的大部分人在秋季庆祝排灯节时，印度东北部的印度教徒则会举行时母法会，以此表现他们对于掌管死亡，时间及变化的女神的特别爱戴。向时母表达敬意的仪式常常充斥着鲜血与骸骨。

original: The Indian religions have so many traditions in common, and the people's beliefs are so mixed, that it is not impossible for a person to simply choose to convert from one of the religions to another. Such a choice may only be made once in a lifetime, however.
translation: 印度的各个宗教在有很多共通的传统，而且人们的信仰十分混杂，因此一个人轻易的从一个宗教转向另一个并非什么不可能的事。但是，这样的选择一生仅能进行一次。

original: The Indian religions have so many traditions in common, and the people's beliefs are so mixed, that it is not impossible for a person to simply choose to convert from one of the religions to another. Such a choice may only be made once in a lifetime, however.
translation: 印度的各个宗教在有很多共通的传统，而且人们的信仰十分混杂，因此一个人轻易的从一个宗教转向另一个并非什么不可能的事。但是，这样的选择一生仅能进行一次。

original: The Indian religions have so many traditions in common, and the people's beliefs are so mixed, that it is not impossible for a person to simply choose to convert from one of the religions to another. Such a choice may only be made once in a lifetime, however.
translation: 印度的各个宗教在有很多共通的传统，而且人们的信仰十分混杂，因此一个人轻易的从一个宗教转向另一个并非什么不可能的事。但是，这样的选择一生仅能进行一次。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not too distant to interact with
Hinduism is a diverse religion with four main branches: Shaivism, Vaishnavism, Shaktism and Smartism. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
translation: 印度教是一个多元化的宗教，有着四个主要的分支，分别是湿婆派，毗湿奴派，性力派，传承派。你皈依后，可以从中选择一个。
湿婆派，奉湿婆为至高神。
毗湿奴派，奉毗湿奴为至高神。

original: Shaktism, revering Shakti, the feminine divine, as supreme.
translation: 性力派，奉夏克提女神之力，为至高奥义。

original: Smartism, revering the oneness of many gods as supreme.
translation: 传承派，将众多的神明视为一个整体奉为最高。

original: Buddhist tradition is marked by immense pluralism, but principally follows three main branches: Mahayana, Vajrayana and Theravada. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
translation: 佛教有着多样的宗教传统，主要归于以下三个分支，分别是大乘佛教，金刚乘佛教，上座部佛教。你皈依后，可以从中选择一个。
大乘佛教，发愿普度众生。
金刚乘佛教，穷究真俗二谛。
上座部佛教，谨从巴利经卷。

original: Jainism is a religion with strong traditions divided into two main branches: Digambara and Svetambara. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
translation: 耆那教有着强烈的宗教传统，并有两个主要分支，天衣派和白衣派。你皈依后，可以从中选择一个。

original: The two traditions of Jainism are Digambara, the sky-clad, and Svetambara, the white-clad. You have decided to shed the old and step onto a new path.
translation: 耆那教有着两个传统派别，天衣派与白衣派。你决定舍弃旧的思想并走上新的道路。

original: I am now a Digambara Jain.
I am now a Svetambara Jain.
§RWARNING:§! [From.GetFirstName] might not passively accept your decision!
I WILL have what is mine!

[From.GetBestName] - a disgruntled noble from the court of [From.Liege.GetTitledName] - has appeared in my realm, furious that [From.GetPossPronoun] [FromScope.GetLiegeRelation] would deny [From.GetObjectPronoun] a title of [From.GetPossPronoun] own. [From.GetTitledFirstName] intends to raise an army and take the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] by force!
translation: [From.Liege.GetTitledName]宫廷里的[From.GetBestName]出现在我的领地里，对[From.GetPossPronoun][FromScope.GetLiegeRelation]否决[From.GetObjectPronoun]获得一个[From.GetPossPronoun]头衔感到愤怒。[From.GetTitledFirstName]打算起兵武力夺取[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]！

original: I guess I can allow that...

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is so furious over my refusal to grant [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] a title that [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] has left the realm for the court of [From.GetTitledName], letting it be known that [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is hiring troops to take what is 'rightfully' [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] by force of arms!
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]对我拒绝授予[FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]头衔而愤怒，[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]已经离开我的领地，投靠了[From.GetTitledName]，[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]还在招兵买马要宣扬他[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]「正当性」！

original: Nestorianism is an early Christian branch which states that Christ has two separate natures - one divine and one human. This is the opposite of the Monophysite position where Christ has but a single nature. The nominal head of the Nestorian Church is the Patriarch of the East.
translation: 聂斯脱里派是早期基督教的分支，其中指出，基督有两个分离的本质——神性和人性。这与一性论者认为基督只有一个本质相反。聂斯脱里派教会名义上的领导者是东方牧首。

original: Paulicianism is Christian Gnostic heresy influenced by Manichaeism, originating in Armenia. In the game, it is treated as an Orthodox heresy.
translation: 保禄派是基督教诺斯替异端被摩尼教影响形成，起源于亚美尼亚。在游戏中，它被视为东正教的异端。

original: The Messalians, or Euchites ("Those who Pray"), are a heretical Christian sect that originated in Mesopotamia, influenced by dualistic faiths like Zoroastrianism. Messalians believe that God can be perceived by the carnal senses, and that this perception is necessary to reach perfection. Each person is born with an inner demon, and only intense prayer can drive it out. They also believe that Lucifer is the elder son of God and a force for good, and that incest is sacred since it was practised by the children of Adam and Eve. They have no formal rites and no strict church hierarchy.
translation: 麦撒怜，或尤奇特斯（「祈祷的人」），是源于美索不达米亚的基督教异端，受到二元信仰祆教的影响。祈祷者们相信神可以通过肉体感官所感知，而这种感知必须达到完美。每个人内心天生就存在魔鬼，只有通过强烈的祈祷才能驱逐。他们还认为，路西法是上帝的长子并代表善的力量，且自从亚当和夏娃的孩子实践之后，乱伦是神圣的。他们没有正式的仪式，也没有严格的教会阶层。

original: Since §Y[ActorExtra.GetFirstName]§! is §Y[RecipientExtra.GetFirstName]'s§! $RELATION$, it would be a sacred union, pleasing to all vassals of the Faith.
translation: 因为§Y[ActorExtra.GetFirstName]§!是§Y[RecipientExtra.GetFirstName]的§!$RELATION$，这将是一个神圣的结合，所有的封臣感到欣喜。

original: Like the children of Adam and Eve at the dawn of time, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have formed a sacred union, pleasing to [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.
translation: 如同原初之时亚当与夏娃的子女，[From.GetTitledFirstName]与[From.GetPossPronoun][GetFromVsNewRelation][New.GetTitledFirstName]神圣结合，以取悦[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]。我们可以征收一笔王家补助税来支附婚礼的花费。

original: Expelled the Order of St Addai
Expel the Order of St Addai
I can drive the Order of Saint Addai from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以驱逐圣亚戴骑士团，并收缴他们的城堡。然而这是亵渎宗教之举……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Order of St Addai
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给圣亚戴骑士团

original: I can donate money to the Order of Saint Addai in exchange for Piety and lifelong respect from the [Root.Religion.GetName] Church.
translation: 我可以捐赠钱财给圣亚戴骑士团，以换取虔诚，并且可以终身得到[Root.Religion.GetName]教会的尊重。

original: The imperative to protect the Holy Places for Nestorian Christianity has caused the Catholicos, [Root.RelHead.GetTitledName], to declare the creation of a holy brotherhood of warrior monks - the Order of Saint Addai, named after the apostle who spread Christianity to Syria and Mesopotamia. They stand ready to smite heathens and infidels and protect the righteous in the name of any [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler who is willing to provide for their upkeep.
translation: 为了保护聂斯脱里派的圣地，大牧首[Root.RelHead.GetTitledName]宣布成立武装修士组成的神圣兄弟会——圣亚戴骑士团，以在叙利亚及美索不达米亚传道的圣人命名。骑士团愿以任何提供补给的[Root.Religion.GetName]领主之名，痛击异教徒与不信者，保卫信徒，申张正义。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Order of Saint Addai in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入圣亚戴骑士团，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Knight of Saint Addai.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order of Saint Addai needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

Pax Christi,
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最公正的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，圣亚戴骑士团急需更多城堡与领地来训练士卒并提兵收入。您领地上的[FromFrom.GetName]是一个不错的地方。我愿意以 100 个金币换取在那里建筑新城的权利。

主赐和平，
大团长[From.GetFirstName]

original: The Order of Saint Addai has constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 圣亚戴骑士团在[Root.GetName]修建了城堡！

original:
Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Order of Saint Addai serve Christ, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，这是无端的敌意！圣亚戴骑士团侍奉我主基督，人们会质疑你是否也是如此？

由衷愤怒并失望，
大团长[From.GetFirstName]

original: A young warrior, Seljuk, son of Toqaq of the Iron Bow of the Kinik tribe, has become something of a legend after performing several astounding feats of valor. I feel compelled to give this remarkable man a place at my court.
translation: 一位年轻的战士，乞尼黑部铁弓杜卡克之子塞尔柱，英武不凡，屡建奇功。我认为我们应该将这位勇士邀请到我们宫廷，使之为我所用。

original: My men are restless and my ambitions must no longer be delayed. I must choose a juicy target and call my tribe to war!
translation: 我的族人已经饥渴难耐，等着实现我的伟大理想。我要选一片膏腴之地为目标，并召集部属开战！

original: [From.GetBestName], perhaps the most able warrior in my realm, has called his tribe and many other hopefuls to war, declaring his intention to take the [FromFrom.Duchy.GetFullBaseName] from [FromFrom.Holder.TopLiege.GetBestName]!
translation: [From.GetBestName]，可能是我手下最出色的战士，他已经召集部众，发兵攻打[FromFrom.Holder.TopLiege.GetBestName]，以夺取[FromFrom.Duchy.GetFullBaseName]！

original: He will be missed, but I wish him luck!
translation: 人人都会想他的，祝他好运！

original: My tribe, the fighting Kinik, stand behind me as I set out to conquer [From.Duchy.GetFullBaseName]. Let [From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] tremble in fear!
translation: 我乞尼黑部支持我出兵[From.Duchy.GetFullBaseName]。颤抖吧，[From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: In the steppes of Central Asia, a great warrior has emerged as the leader of the Kinik tribe of the Oghuz Turks, demonstrating his brilliance by winning a war against the mighty [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Other tribes have taken notice and warriors of all stripes are flocking to his banners in great numbers. Seljuk Khan has promised them a fortune in plunder in his future conquests!
translation: 中亚草原上，乌古斯突厥乞尼黑部的伟大战士塞尔柱，在征服强大的[FromFrom.GetTitledName]中展现无比才华。众部落以他马首是瞻，出身各地的勇士投入他麾下。塞尔柱汗许诺，凡有功者，征战过后，都能分得财宝！

original: He is a credit to all Turks!

translation: 突厥诸汗不过都是过眼云烟……

original: Turkish warriors from the homeland keep arriving in great numbers, hoping to serve in the armies of the great Seljuk's successor. With men such as these, I can accomplish anything!
translation: 家乡来的突厥战士不断涌至，希望能侍奉塞尔柱汗的继承人。有如此壮士虎将，我将天下无敌！

original: Seljuk would be proud of his heir!
translation: 塞尔柱会为其子孙自豪的！

original: Horsemen from the great steppes keep arriving in great numbers, hoping to serve in the armies of Timur Khan's successor. With warriors like these, I can accomplish anything!
translation: 自大草原而来的骑手不断涌至，希望能侍奉帖木儿汗的继承人。有如此壮士虎将，我将天下无敌！

original: The Iron Khan would be proud!

A brilliant horseman and daring raider by the name of Timur has distinguished himself several times now. My commanders all agree that I should give this remarkable young man a chance to prove himself as a leader, clubfoot or no.
translation: 帖木儿是一位杰出的骑手，一个大胆的劫掠者，最近此人声名大噪。我的将领都同意我应该要给这个年轻人证明自己领导才能的机会，即使他是瘸腿的。

original: As long as he does not turn on me!
translation: 只要他效忠于我，怎样都好！

original: As I've fought for my liege I have gathered a large and loyal following, brave horsemen all. Rather than rise up against my old liege, I've decided to strike out for [From.Duchy.GetFullBaseName]. Let [From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName] tremble in fear!
translation: 在为我主而战时，我有了一批忠于自己的部下，他们全都是英勇的骑手。与其起兵对抗旧主，倒不如出征[From.Duchy.GetFullBaseName]。颤抖吧，[From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Another great Khan is on the rise in Central Asia. Timur, called 'the Lame' due to his clubfoot, has proven himself to the Turco-Mongol tribes of the region. He seems intent on creating an empire to rival that of the legendary Genghis Khan himself, as he has just finished crushing [FromFrom.GetTitledName] in a brutal war. Tens of thousands of skilled horsemen have gathered under his banner!
translation: 又一位大汗在中亚崛起了，瘸子帖木儿在当地的突厥化的蒙古部落间湛露头角。他正要建立足以与成吉思汗匹敌的功业，不久前他就攻克了[FromFrom.GetTitledName]。数以万计熟练的骑手聚集在他麾下！

original: He is a credit to all Mongols!

translation: 这些马上雄主可真难对付！

original: My manifest destiny allows me to invade §Y$TARGET$§!. If successful, everything §Y$TARGET$§! controls within the §Y$TITLE$§! will be taken or vassalized.
translation: 昭昭天命允许我入侵§Y$TARGET$§!。成功后，任何§Y$TARGET$§!控制的§Y$TITLE$§!将会被夺走或成为附庸。
这个角色跟一只猴子结了婚……

original: Honor is respected by the clergy and especially the head of your Religion. It can be spent to petition the head of your Religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
translation: 荣誉是指神职人员与宗教领袖对你的尊重，你可以凭此向你的宗教领袖请愿。就像威望一样，在你去世的时候会加在你家族的分数里。

original: Designate this Character as Your Heir
translation: 指定此人为你的继承人

original: Marks the Character as the Designated Heir
translation: 指定此人为你的继承人

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! must not marry someone from another Caste
Karma is respected by the clergy and monastics of your religion. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
translation: 多积善业会令你获得本宗教神职人员的尊重，如同威望一样，在领主去世后将会加到家族总分里。

original: Purity is respected by the clergy and monks of the Jain religion, and also affects the loyalty of your Jain vassals. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
translation: 保持纯净会令你获得耆那教修行者的尊重，并令你的耆那教封臣更加忠诚，如同威望一样，在领主去世后将会加到家族总分里。

original: To properly celebrate the seasonal feast, you should invite all your vassals. You have your scribe write the letters and send them off, the messengers' satchels decorated with flowers.
translation: 庆祝这个重大节庆必然隆重其事，你邀请所有的封臣都到来，请柬是由最好的书吏起草的，信差的书袋上更饰有鲜花。

original: It will be a grand feast!

Dear vassal,
I hereby invite you to attend my celebration of the feast of Diwali.

Your Liege,
[From.GetFullName]
translation:
亲爱的封臣，
兹此诚邀你到来参加我的排灯节庆典。

你的领主，
[From.GetFullName]

original:
Dear vassal,
I hereby invite you to attend my celebration of the feast of Kali Puja.

Your Liege,
[From.GetFullName]
translation:
亲爱的封臣，
兹此诚邀你到来参加我的时母法会。

你的领主，
[From.GetFullName]

original: Your vassal, [From.GetFullName], has refused your invitation to the feast.
translation: 你的封臣[From.GetFullName]拒绝了你的邀请。

original: In the Indian autumn feasts, tradition dictates that you offer a gift to your spouse. You should plan for this and buy something before the feast begins.
translation: 在印度传统中，秋季节庆上你要送一份礼物给你的配偶。在庆典开始前，你要先去买好礼物。

original: A jeweled necklace would be perfect!
translation: 配上一条宝石项链就完美了！

original: Perhaps a small perfume box or something.
translation: 一盒香粉或是些小东西就好。

original: I will spend money on my lover instead...
translation: 我宁可花钱在情人身上……

original: A magnificent horse would please him!
translation: 那六尺骄骏他会喜欢的！

original: A nice cape or something will be enough.
translation: 一件上好披肩或是些其他的东西就好。

original: I will spend money on my lover instead...
translation: 我宁可将钱花在情郎身上……

original: In accordance with tradition, you may offer a gift to your lover during the autumn feast.
translation: 按照传统，秋日节庆上你要送一份礼物给你的情人。
我会买昂贵的珠宝给她。

original: A small box of perfume will do.
I will buy him a magnificent horse!
This nice cape should do fine.
At the feast, it's time for the traditional ceremony of gifts...
translation: 在宴会上，互赠礼物的时间到了……

original: My wife is overjoyed with the magnificent gift!
translation: 我的妻子看到我赠送的珍贵的礼物沉浸在无比的幸福之中！

original: My wife is pleased with her gift.
translation: 我的妻子看到我的礼物感到很高兴。

original: My wife is upset because I didn't get her anything.
translation: 我的妻子因为没得到礼物感到很生气。

original: My lover is overjoyed with her gift! My wife is not happy, though...
translation: 我的情人很喜欢我给她的礼物，但是我的妻子十分生气……

original: My lover is overjoyed with her gift!
translation: 我的情人很喜欢我给她的礼物！

original: My lover is pleased with her gift. My wife is not happy, though...
translation: 我送的礼物让我的情人非常高兴！但是看来我的妻子不是很开心……

original: My lover is pleased with her gift.
translation: 我的情人对我送的礼物很满意。

original: My lover is disappointed because I didn't get her anything.
translation: 我没有送给我情人任何东西，她看起来不是很开心。

original: My husband is overjoyed with the magnificent gift!
translation: 我送的礼物让我的丈夫非常高兴！

original: My husband is pleased with his gift.
translation: 我的丈夫对我送的礼物很满意。

original: My husband is upset because I didn't get him anything.
translation: 我没有送给我丈夫任何东西，他看起来不是很开心。

original: My lover is overjoyed with his gift! But my husband isn't happy...
translation: 我送的礼物让我的情人非常高兴！但是看来我的丈夫不是很开心……

original: My lover is overjoyed with his gift!
translation: 我送的礼物让我的情人非常高兴！

original: My lover is pleased with his gift. But my husband isn't happy...
translation: 我的情人对我送的礼物很满意。但是看来我的丈夫不是很开心……

original: My lover is pleased with his gift.
translation: 我的情人对我送的礼物很满意。

original: My lover is disappointed because I didn't get him anything.
translation: 我没有送给我情人任何东西，他看起来不是很开心。

original: The castle is decorated with flowers and colorful tapestries, carpets and ribbons. All the guests have arrived, there is a bustle of people all eager and full of festive spirit. It's time for the feast to begin!
translation: 整个城堡被彩带，挂毯，地毯和鲜花装饰了起来。所有的客人都已经到齐了，一股欢快的节日气氛弥漫在他们之间。是时候开始宴会了！

original: The feast is over, but it was a fantastic feast. As the guests make their way home you sit down and smile to yourself, pleased at how things turned out.
translation: 这次奇妙的宴会结束了。当客人回家的时候你坐下笑了起来，细细回味这段美好时光。

original: I should do this again next year!
translation: 明年我应该再举办一次宴会！

original: The feast is over, but it didn't quite turn out as you had hoped. As the guests make their way home, you sit down and ponder what went wrong.
translation: 这次不太成功的宴会结束了。当客人回家的时候你坐在那里细想是哪里出了错。

original: Maybe next time it will be better.
The feast is over, but it was a fantastic feast. As you make your way home, you think that you'd probably come back next year again if invited.
translation: 这次奇妙的宴会结束了。在回家的路上，你觉得如果明年自己再次受邀，那么自己很可能会赴约。

original: The feast is over, but certain unfortunate events prevented you from enjoying it fully. As you make your way home, you ponder the ups and downs of life.
translation: 宴会结束了，但是期间一些不愉快的小插曲让你并不开心。在回家的路上，你开始思考起了人生。

original: A snake charmer is entertaining the guests at the feast. He plays a flute and sings in odd tones to various poisonous snakes that he has brought in a basket. The audience is held captivated by his skills as he seemingly controls the snakes with his voice and his music.
translation: 宴会上有一名耍蛇人在向客人表演，他正在用长笛向篮子里面的毒蛇吹奏着异域歌曲。蛇在他的笛声与歌声中翩翩起舞，围观的客人被他的精湛技巧所折服。

original: There is a silence among the revellers as the snake charmer works his magic with the snakes. But suddenly you hear a high shriek, and the snake charmer looks confused - it seems a large cobra has broken free and is slithering across the floor towards the guests!
translation: 一群客人在喧闹的宴会中静静地看着耍蛇人的表演。突然你听见一声尖叫，耍蛇人脸上露出了迷惑——看起来一条巨大的眼镜蛇从笼子里跑了出来，并且钻进人群中！

original: The escaped cobra disappears under the table. There are a few moments of silence, and then a shrill shriek. The cobra has slithered up into the lap of one of the guests, scaring the person half to death! The snake, then quickly disappears out through an open window.
translation: 眼镜蛇钻到了桌子下面。一阵沉默后人群中传出一声大叫。眼镜蛇爬上了一名客人的膝盖，把他吓得半死！然后眼镜蛇迅速地钻出了窗外。

original: We're not hiring this snake charmer again.
translation: 我们再也不雇这个耍蛇人了。

original: A snake charmer is entertaining the guests at the feast. He plays a flute and sings in odd tones to various poisonous snakes that he has brought in a basket. Then, suddenly you feel something cold and slithery moving in your lap...
translation: 一名耍蛇人正在宴会上向客人表演，他正在用长笛向篮子里面的毒蛇吹奏着异域歌曲。突然你感到某个滑腻和冷冰冰的东西爬上了你的膝盖……

original: The escaped cobra disappears under the table. There are a few moments of silence, and then a terrified scream. One of the guests is shaking in violent convulsions, with people nearby staring in shock as they realize the snake has bitten their neighbor. As the snake disappears out through an open window, the victim stops shaking and lies still, dead.
translation: 眼镜蛇钻到了桌子下面。一刻沉默后人群中传出一声凄惨的叫声。一名客人倒在地上剧烈地抽搐着，旁边的客人震惊地意识到他被眼镜蛇咬了。随着眼镜蛇迅速地钻出了窗外，这个倒霉的人也慢慢停止了抽搐，死了。

original: The escaped cobra slithers across the floor. The guests at the table seem paralyzed, except for one person who quickly draws his sword and steps forward, chopping the animal in half with a swift cut.
translation: 眼镜蛇一路爬过地板，所有的客人都吓呆了。这时一名客人站了出来，迅速地抽出佩剑将蛇一刀斩断。

original: A snake charmer is entertaining the guests at the feast, until suddenly a cobra escapes! You quickly draw your sword and step forward, chopping the animal in half with a swift cut.
translation: 一名耍蛇人正在宴会上向客人表演，突然一条眼镜蛇从耍蛇人的篮子里跑了出来！你迅速地站了出来，抽出佩剑将蛇一刀斩断。

original: Don't try this at home, folks.

That person over there has been looking at you in a funny way during the entire feast. Laughing, thinking evil thoughts about you. You have tried putting goat's cheese in your hair to ward it off, but still his scheming ways threaten you. He wants to take your gold. And your undergarments.
translation: 宴会上有一个人始终用戏谑的眼光盯着你。他一定在嘲笑你，或者想要加害于你。你试图将一切抛诸脑后，但是他那鬼鬼祟祟的行为让你不得不相信：他一定在想怎样将你洗劫一空。

original: A duel! I will tear his brain from his skull!
translation: 决斗吧！我会把他的脑子从颅骨里面拉出来！

original: No time now, I must frolic. I must frolic.
translation: 时候未到，还是让我们享用美食吧。

original: The voices in your head have spoken. The pressure rises, you must see blood flow tonight or you will go insane. Anyone at the table of the feast will do - ah, that one!
translation: 你脑中的声音再次开口了。今晚必须有人流血，不然你就会发疯！不管是谁流血都行——哈，那个人看起来不错！

original: You, scum! I challenge you to a duel!
translation: 你这个渣滓，我向你提出决斗！

original: Now is not the time... I must breathe...
translation: 还不是时候……让我深呼吸……

original: A fellow guest at the feast, mindless of his manners, has repeatedly turned his back on you and now he spilled sauce on your garments. You are certain it was on purpose - or at least you're not certain it wasn't.
translation: 宴会里的一名客人非常粗鲁地频频把他的背转向你，现在他又把酱汁洒在了你的衣服上面。你很确定他是有意的——或者说你不确定他是无意的。

original: Enough! I challenge you to a duel, Sir!
translation: 我受够了！先生，我向你提出决斗！

original: No, this is not the right time.
You are enjoying a fantastic show of dancers at the feast. Suddenly, a fellow reveller accidentally bumps into you, knocking your drink out of your hand.
translation: 你正在宴会上观看一段动人的舞蹈。突然另一名客人不小心撞上了你，把你手中的饮料打翻在地。

original: Grab him and challenge him to a duel!
translation: 抓住他并向他提出决斗！

original: Take your rage out on the furniture.
That man who has been staring at you several times during the feast is surely plotting to murder you. Better to fight him here in the open than him sticking a knife in your back later.
translation: 那个宴会里一直盯着你看的人一定在策划怎样谋杀你。最好现在就在大庭广众下向他发起决斗，总比之后不明不白被捅刀子好。

original: You! I challenge you to a duel!
On second thought, I may be imagining things.
translation: 三思过后，我觉得我只是想多了。

original: What a great feast! You have been drinking heavily for several days, only pausing to sleep (but not much). You are wandering around the grounds, not exactly sure where you are. You excuse yourself to people as you bump into them.\n\nYou have the servants fetch you another drink. What day is it? It seems you are wearing someone else's clothes. How funny! Someone tells you to calm down, how annoying. Someone else wants their clothes back, now they're shouting and threatening.
translation: 多好的宴会！你豪饮数日，中间只睡了很短的时间。你在不知道是哪的地方迷迷糊糊地走着，不断向被你撞上的人道歉。\n\n与此同时你打发你的仆人去取另一杯酒。今天是什么日子来着？看起来好像你正穿着别人的衣服。有意思！有人叫你安静下来，真惹人厌。另外一些人想把他们的衣服拿回来。现在他们冲你大吼起来。

original: What the... I'll kill you, party spoilers!
translation: 啥？我要杀了你们这些打扰我兴致的人！

original: Come now, let's calm down and have a drink...
translation: 过来，让我们冷静下来然后一起干一杯……

original: A fellow guest at the feast, clearly out of his mind, has challenged you to a duel. It seems to you there is no good reason, and duels can be very dangerous, but backing down might still make you look weak.
translation: 一名明显犯傻了的宴会客人向你提出决斗。你不必应战，而且决斗是非常危险的。但是退缩会让你显得胆小。

original: I accept! You will regret this.
translation: 我接受！你会为此后悔的！

original: No, this is crazy. Go away.
translation: 不，这太疯狂了。离我远点。

original: Your intended opponent refuses to duel with you.
translation: 你的对手拒绝接受你的决斗要求。

original: I will eat your brain later, coward!
translation: 懦夫！等着看我是怎样吃掉你的脑子的吧！

original: Ah, I see, you are a coward.
translation: 啊哈，我懂了，原来你是个懦夫。

original: You do this to spite me!
translation: 你这么做是故意为了气我！

original: Tension runs high at the feast. [From.GetTitledName] has challenged [FromFrom.GetTitledName]to a duel, but the latter chose to back down, doing some injury to his prestige.
translation: 宴会紧张的气氛达到了高潮。[From.GetTitledName]要求与[FromFrom.GetTitledName]进行决斗，但是后者退缩了，其威望也因此受到了损失。

original: It's good that bloodshed was avoided.
Shame, it would have livened up the feast.
translation: 可恶，我还等着看决斗助兴呢。

original: The guests at the feast gather around to see the duel between you and [FromFrom.GetFullName]. As the challenged party, you have the right to choose which weapon shall be used in the duel.
translation: 宴会上的客人全部围成一圈来观看你和[FromFrom.GetFullName]的决斗。作为接受决斗挑战的一方，你有权选择决斗时双方使用的武器。

original: [From.GetFullName] has accepted your challenge and there will be a duel. As the challenged party, your opponent may choose what weapons will be used and he has chosen swords. The other guests at the feast gather around to see you fight.
translation: [From.GetFullName]接受了你的挑战，决斗即将开始。作为接受决斗挑战的一方，你的对手有权选择决斗时双方使用的武器。而他选择了剑。现在其他客人全部围成了一圈，等着观看决斗。

original: [From.GetFullName] has accepted your challenge and there will be a duel. As the challenged party, your opponent may choose what weapons will be used and he has chosen daggers. The other guests at the feast gather around to see you fight.
translation: [From.GetFullName]接受了你的挑战，决斗即将开始。作为接受决斗挑战的一方，你的对手有权选择决斗时双方使用的武器。而他选择了匕首。现在其他客人全部围成了一圈，等着观看决斗。
很好，去把我的匕首取来。

original: [From.GetFullName] has accepted your challenge and there will be a duel. As the challenged party, your opponent may choose what weapons will be used and he has chosen spears. The other guests at the feast gather around to see you fight.
translation: [From.GetFullName]接受了你的挑战，决斗即将开始。作为接受决斗挑战的一方，你的对手有权选择决斗时双方使用的武器。而他选择了长矛。现在其他客人全部围成了一圈，等着观看决斗。
很好，去把我的长矛取来。

original: The duel is about to start. But first, there is one thing that remains for you to decide: will you fight honorably or fight dirty? The latter choice will obviously increase your chances, but there is a large crowd watching and they will see everything that happens.
translation: 决斗马上要开始了。但是最后还有一个问题：你是准备光明正大地战斗，亦或是会使出一些阴招？后者肯定会增加你的胜算，但是别忘了，有很多人在围观，你的一举一动都尽收他们眼底。
傻瓜才光明正大地战斗。

original: The duel commences. You begin to circle around each other, both of you observing the other closely and feinting to try and gauge the skill of the opponent. Then suddenly, steel flashes and there is a flurry of attacks and counterattacks. Gasps of terror and of delight are heard from the audience, mixing with the curses and grunts from the duelists and the sound of clashing steel...
translation: 决斗开始了。你们开始围着场地中央慢慢转圈。你们两人都在仔细观察对手的行动，等待破绽。突然武器出鞘，一方发起了攻击，另外一方慌忙接招。空气中夹杂着各种咒骂、恐惧与如释重负的叹息、决斗者挥舞武器和钢铁相交的声音……

original: Let's hope no one gets killed.
I hope we'll see some blood!

During the feast, you are entertained by dancers. One of the female dancers especially catches your attention. She moves with near divine grace and allure, and you feel strangely attracted to her. You come to think of the mysterious and beautiful Apsara of legend, shapechanging dancers descending from the heavens.
translation: 在宴会中，你享受着舞蹈。一个女性舞者引起了你的注意。她优雅的舞步深深地吸引着你。你好似见到了传说中神秘而美丽的飞天女神，从天而降变幻多姿的舞者。

original: Call her over after the dance.

You call the dancer over after the dance has finished, and she comes and sits down next to you. You talk of the body, pleasure and beauty. She sits very close to you, speaking with a soft and seductive voice. You begin to feel strangely warm and light-headed. It feels good.
translation: 你叫舞者在舞蹈结束后过来，她过来坐在你的身边。你们谈论身体，愉悦和美感。她坐得离你很近，用柔软而诱人的声音说话。你开始感到奇怪的温暖和头晕。这感觉很好。
让我们去私密一点的地方……

original: Enchanted, but you should leave, my dear.
translation: 令人入迷，但你应当离开，亲爱的。

original: As you wake, your mind is filled with memories of a wonderful night of pleasure. You look around, but the dancer is gone without a trace. It was truly something extraordinary, and your mind wanders to old tales told by priests and storytellers - was she really a human woman, or could it be that you have met one of the beautiful Apsara of legend?
translation: 你醒来时，心中只有春宵一刻的愉快回忆。你环顾四周，舞者早已消失地无影无踪。这真是非同寻常，你心旌摇荡，想起那些祭司和讲故事的人告诉过你的那些古老传说——她真的是人类吗，还是你遇到了传说中的飞天女神？

original: I have been touched by the divine.

At one point during the feast, a male singer performs. His voice is captivating and sensual, notes dancing across the room and tickling your skin with an almost physical touch. You are completely captivated by his charisma - he reminds you of the mysterious and beautiful Gandharvas of legend, singer spirits of the sky making music for the gods.
translation: 在盛宴中的一刻，一个男歌手进行了表演。他的声音迷人感性，他在房间里跳舞，似有若无的身体接触使你浑身发痒。你完全被他的魅力迷住——他让你想起传说中神秘而美丽的乾达婆，为众神作乐的天上歌灵。

original: Call him over after the performance.
translation: 在他表演之后叫他过来。

original: You call the singer over after the performance has finished, and he comes and sits down next to you. You talk of music, the body, pleasure and beauty. He sits very close to you, speaking with a soft and seductive voice. You begin to feel strangely warm and light-headed. It feels good.
translation: 你叫歌手在演出结束后过来，他过来坐在你身边。你们谈论音乐，身体，愉悦和美感。他坐得离你非常近，用柔软而诱人的声音说话。你开始感到奇怪的温暖和头晕。这感觉很好。

original: As you wake, your mind is filled with memories of a wonderful night of pleasure. You look around, but the singer is gone without a trace. A small bird flies by outside the window, singing beautifully. Your mind wanders to old tales told by priests and storytellers - was he really a human man, or could it be that you have met one of the beautiful Gandharva of legend?
translation: 你醒来时，心中充满了关于那个美妙夜晚的愉悦回忆。你环顾四周，歌手早已消失得无影无踪。一只小鸟从窗外飞逝而过，婉转而鸣。你心驰神往，想起了祭司和讲故事的人告诉你的那些古老故事——他真的是人类吗，抑或是你遇到了一位传说中的美丽的乾达婆？

original: There is a murmur among the guests of the feast, as a mage enters to entertain you. With great flourish, he explains that the coming show will astound even the most cyncial spectator. He proceeds to put a small boy into a basket on the floor, wherafter he swiftly chops the basket into little pieces with a sword. When he removes the shreds of the basket, there is no sign of the boy, no blood, nothing...
translation: 盛宴的宾客们窃窃私语起来，一个法师进来招待你。伴随着舞蹈，他解释说，即将到来的表演将震惊即使是最怀疑的观众。接着他把一个小男孩变成一个篮子放在地上，然后他用剑将筐砍成小块。当他清理了了篮下的碎片，没有孩子，没有血，什么都没有……

original: There is a murmur among the guests of the feast, as a mage enters to entertain you. With great flourish, he places three cups before you on the table. He places a ball under one cup, and then tells you to observe closely and tell you where the ball is after he finishes moving the cups. He then shifts the cups around with lightning speed, all the while prattling on and telling you to pay attention. He then asks you to pick a cup.
translation: 盛宴的宾客们窃窃私语起来，一个法师进来招待你。伴随着舞蹈，他在在你面前的桌子上放置三个杯子。他把一个球放到其中一个杯子内，然后告诉你要密切观察，并告诉你球在哪个杯子里。随后，他以迅雷不及掩耳之势四处移动的杯子，同时和你胡扯告诉你要注意。然后，他会要求你选择一个杯子。

original: The magician looks at you with a knowing and superior smile as he reveals the ball. It seems you chose the wrong cup.
translation: 魔术师带着狡黠和卓越的微笑看着你，他揭示了答案。看来你选错了杯子。

original: I saw you cheating, you trickster!
translation: 我看见你作弊，你这个骗子！

original: There is a murmur among the guests of the feast, as a mage enters to entertain you. With great flourish, he explains that you are about to see something amazing. He takes out a rope and starts playing a flute. The rope starts dancing by itself and rises up towards the ceiling. The magician beckons, and a small boy appears and starts climbing the rope. The audience gasps. After a minute, the boy climbs down, the magician stops playing and the rope falls down again.
translation: 盛宴中的宾客们窃窃私语起来，一个法师进来招待你。伴随着舞蹈，他解释说，你即将看到神奇的东西。他拿出一根绳子，并开始演奏长笛。绳子开始跳舞，朝天花板上升。魔术师招手，一个小男孩出现，开始登山绳。观众们深吸一口气。一分钟后，男孩爬下，魔术师停止演奏，绳子也再次落下。

original: Hah! I could see the hidden wire.
translation: 哈！我可以看到隐藏的线。

original: You are sitting at the table during the feast, enjoying the food and drink. Suddenly, you hear a wild chattering and screaming. A group of small monkeys have entered through an open window, and they quickly spread in the hall, causing chaos! They pull people's hair and clothes, steal food, spill wine, drink wine and defecate on the tables. The feast hall is in uproar.
translation: 宴会期间，你正坐在桌前，享受着食物和饮料。突然，你听到一阵吱吱尖叫。一群小猴子从一扇开着的窗户爬了进来，迅速在大厅里散开，引起了混乱！他们拉扯人们的头发和衣服，偷吃菜品，弄洒酒杯，还在桌子上拉屎。宴会大厅里一片嘈杂。

original: Let's catch one and see what they look like on the inside...
translation: 让我们抓住一个，看他们里面是什么样子……

original: Such beautiful animals! I shall marry one of them!
translation: 多么美丽的动物！我要嫁给其中之一！

original: Haha! Look at the little rascals! So carefree!
translation: 哈哈！看这个小坏蛋！那么无忧无虑！

original: Aaah! Get those little monsters out of here!
translation: 啊哈！让这些小怪物离开这里！

original: The darkest night of the Diwali is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles and lamps are lit everywhere, the guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, wearing colorful dress. Rich and sweet food is served, and the drink is also plentiful. Rama and Lakshi are honored, celebrating the victory of light over darkness, good over evil and hope over despair.
translation: 排灯节的最黑暗的夜晚到了，这是宴中最重要的夜晚。到处都点亮着蜡烛和灯笼，客人们穿着各色盛装迈过彩绘装饰的地板。丰富甜美的食物和饮料随处供应。人们纪念罗摩和吉祥天女，庆祝光明战胜黑暗，善良战胜邪恶，希望战胜绝望的胜利。

original: The darkest night of the Diwali is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles and lamps are lit everywhere, the guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, wearing colorful dress. Rich and sweet food is served, and the drink is also plentiful. You celebrate the victory of light over darkness, good over evil, knowledge over ignorance and hope over despair.
translation: 排灯节的最黑暗的夜晚到了，这是宴中最重要的夜晚。到处都点亮着蜡烛和灯笼，客人们穿着各色盛装迈过彩绘装饰的地板。丰富甜美的食物和饮料随处供应。你们庆祝光明战胜黑暗，善良战胜邪恶，知识战胜愚昧，希望战胜绝望的胜利。

original: The darkest night of the Diwali is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles and lamps are lit everywhere, the guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, wearing colorful dress. Rich and sweet food is served. The attainment of Nirvana of Lord Mahavira, the last Tirthankar, is celebrated, with the victory of good over evil and knowledge over ignorance.
translation: 排灯节的最黑暗的夜晚到了，这是宴中最重要的夜晚。到处都点亮着蜡烛和灯笼，客人们穿着各色盛装迈过彩绘装饰的地板。丰富甜美的食物和饮料随处供应。人们庆祝大雄尊者，最后的渡津者的涅槃，庆祝善良战胜邪恶，知识战胜愚昧的胜利。

original: The darkest night of the Kali Puja is here, the most important night of the feast. Candles are lit everywhere, placed inside human skulls. The guests stroll across the painted and decorated floor, carrying various symbols of time, death and change. Homage is offered to the beautiful and terrifying four-armed idols with swords, skulls and severed heads in their hands.
translation: 迦梨时母法会的最黑暗的夜晚到了，这是宴中最重要的夜晚。到处都点亮着蜡烛和灯笼，它们被放在人类头骨内。客人们穿着各色盛装迈过彩绘装饰的地板，地板上有象征着死亡和变化的各种符号。美丽而恐怖的四臂人像手中擎着保健、髑髅和人头，人们向他们表达敬畏。

original: Let's do something extra this year...
translation: 让我们在今年做些额外的事情……

original: Kali is our Mother, the Goddess of Time, Death and the Darkest Night. She must be honored properly, and you have just the right thing in mind...
translation: 迦梨是我们的母亲，时间，死亡和黑暗夜晚的女神。她必须得到适当尊重，你只需要记住正确的事情……

original: We will sacrifice that servant over there.
translation: 我们献祭那边的那个仆人。

original: We will sacrifice ten elephants and paint the walls with blood.
translation: 我们将献祭十头大象并用血粉刷墙壁。

original: [From.GetFullName] screams as [From.GetSheHe] is dragged before the great idol of Kali. As temple servants hold [From.GetHerHim] down, a priest pulls out a long kris and then stabs [From.GetHerHim] right through the heart. Then [From.GetHerHis] throat is cut and the blood is slowly collected in bowls made of a human skulls and passed around for the guests to drink.
translation: [From.GetFullName]尖叫着，[From.GetSheHe]被拖到巨大的迦梨的神像前。神殿守卫将[From.GetHerHim]按倒，祭司抽出波形长刀，刺向[From.GetHerHim]，正中其心脏。然后割断[From.GetHerHis]喉咙，血液被收集在颅骨碗里，分给客人们饮用。

original: This is truly a joyous occasion!
translation: 这确实是一个快乐的时刻！

original: The servant screams as he is seized by the guards and then dragged before the great idol of Kali. As temple servants hold him down, a priest pulls out a long kris and then stabs him right through the heart. Then his throat is cut and the blood is slowly collected in bowls made of a human skulls and passed around for the guests to drink.
translation: 仆人尖叫着，他被守卫抓住拖到巨大的迦梨的神像前。神殿守卫在大殿前将他按倒，一个祭司抽出波形长刀，径直刺向了他的心脏。然后，他的喉咙被切断，血液被收集在颅骨碗中，分给客人们享用。

original: A large elephant is led into the hall. It is tied down with strong ropes and chains, and then stabbed with swords, screaming and trumpeting terribly for several minutes as it dies. The guests watch in horrified fascination. The process is then repeated with nine more elephants - a long, bloody cacophonic concert of death. At the end of it, the floor is a lake of blood. Several priests step forth, sliding and slipping in the gore, holding long brushes. They dip the brushes in the blood and start painting the walls, eventually covering them entirely in this gruesome, wet and dark paint. The smell is strong and sickening.
translation: 一个大型的大象被领进大厅。它被绳索和铁链拴住，然后用剑刺伤，它尖叫着直至死亡。客人在惊悚的魅力中观看着。该过程又在其余九个大象身上重复——漫长、血腥，不和谐的死亡音乐会。结束后，地板变成血湖。几个法师迈步向前，拿着刷子，在血液中行走。他们把刷子浸入血液然后粉刷墙壁，最终用这种可怕的深色湿油漆覆盖了墙面。气味令人作呕。

original: Several black goats are brought forth by the priests. The goats are laid down below a large statue of Kali, and their throats are cut open. The blood is collected in bowls made of human skulls and presented to the crowd. A chanting arises, then a cheer, as the holy sacrifice to the Goddess of Death, Time and of the Blackest Night has been made.
translation: 一些黑山羊由祭司带进来。山羊被放置在一个大型雕像前，然后他们的喉咙被切开。血液被收集在用人类头骨制成的碗里呈现给人群。向死亡女神，时间女神，黑夜女神进行的神圣献祭完成后，吟诵声响起，然后是欢呼。

original: You have decided to organize a tiger hunt. You will invite your vassals to enjoy this occasion with you.
translation: 你决定组织一次猎虎大会。你会邀请你的封臣和你一起享受这个时刻。

original:
Dear vassal,

I am organizing a great tiger hunt for all my vassals, and hereby invite you to attend.

[From.GetFullName]
translation:
亲爱的封臣们，

我准备召集诸位进行一次盛大的打虎活动，在此邀请各位参加。

[From.GetFullName]

original: A tiger hunt! Of course I will go.
I have no time for sport.

My liege,

Your wisdom and generosity is overwhelming. I will gladly come to the tiger hunt.

[From.GetFullName]
translation:
我的领主，

你的智慧与仁慈美名远扬。我将很高兴同你一起去打老虎。

[From.GetFullName]

original:
My liege,

Unfortunately, I have pressing business that forces me to decline your invitation to the tiger hunt.

[From.GetFullName]
translation:
我的领主，

很不幸，我最近有点急事所以没法接受您的邀请去打老虎了。

[From.GetFullName]

original: You have arrived at the hunting camp. Retainers are available to see to your every need, and soldiers will be useful both for guarding the camp and for flushing out any tigers. This should be a fine day!
translation: 你已经到达了狩猎营地。管家也已经打理好了一切，士兵们在营帐周围守卫驱赶着可能混进来的野兽。这将会很有趣！

original: The hunters and their respective entourages have gathered at the hunting camp. Retainers are available to see to your every need, and soldiers will be useful both for guarding the camp and for flushing out any tigers. This should be a fine day!
translation: 猎人和他们的随从已经集结在野营当中。管家也已经打理好了一切，士兵们在营帐周围守卫驱赶着可能混进来的野兽。这将会很有趣！

original: A most successful hunt! A slain tiger means luck for the realm and everyone heads for home with new optimism.
translation: 一次无比成功的打猎！一只老虎被猎杀后躺在人群的中央，所有人都很开心。

original: A failed hunt! No tigers were slain, and this is an ill omen for the realm. You vow to return and have better luck next time.
translation: 一次失败的打猎！没有猎杀到老虎，这是对国家来说是一个不好的征兆。你临走前发誓下一次你会做得更好。

original: The social life at the camp is an important part of the tiger hunt. Late at night, after many cups of wine, you sit and talk into the small hours. You are having a good time, and it seems you have made a new friend.
translation: 野营是猎人们重要的生活组成部分。入了夜之后，几杯葡萄酒下肚，你坐下来加入了他们的讨论。你经历了一段美好的时光，而且看起来你又交到了新朋友。

original: The social life at the camp is an important part of the tiger hunt. Late at night, after many cups of wine, you sit and talk into the small hours. But misunderstandings occur so easily among the inebriated...
translation: 猎虎的时候的社交是很重要的一部分。与良酒相伴，你们在夜幕的笼罩下尽情的畅谈，不过醉酒时误会是那么容易的发生……

original: Evening pastimes during the tiger hunt include playing at cards. A group has gathered to play and you join them. Of course, the game is only interesting if you play for gold and silver - but how much will you bet?
translation: 每次猎虎的时候都可以玩牌。一小组人坐下来一起玩牌，你可以加入他们。当然你需要有足够的金银，你准备赌上多少呢？

original: The card game didn't go very well, and you lost a significant amount of money.
translation: 你玩牌玩的很烂，输掉了一大笔金钱。

original: I knew I shouldn't have played!
You had mixed fortunes at the card game, and in the end your wins and losses balanced out.
translation: 你的运气一般般，既没有赢也没有输。

original: You had an excellent run at the card game, and won a significant amount of money.
translation: 你在纸牌游戏中表现出色，赢了一大笔钱。

original: The hunting party moves through the jungle. You are hoping luck will find you a tiger to kill. Suddenly, there is a movement in the underbrush... and a large tiger springs out, roaring fiercely! It attacks the hunting party, but soldiers immediately move to attack it and they manage to kill it with their spears.
translation: 猎人们穿越了丛林，你希望你能幸运地找到一只老虎。突然，前方的树丛有动静传来……一只猛虎咆哮着跳出了丛林并且开始攻击猎人们。幸好士兵们赶紧跑过来用长矛杀死了它。

original: The hunting party moves through the jungle. You are hoping luck will find you a tiger to kill. Suddenly, there is a movement in the underbrush... and a large tiger springs out, roaring fiercely! It attacks the hunting party, striking at one of the servants, ripping him to shreds before disappearing again into the jungle.
translation: 猎人们穿越了丛林，你希望你能幸运地找到一只老虎。突然，前方的树丛有动静传来……一只猛虎咆哮着跳出了丛林并且开始攻击猎人们。它把你其中一个侍从撕成了碎片，然后消失在丛林之中。

original: The hunting party moves through the jungle. You are hoping luck will find you a tiger to kill. Suddenly, there is a movement in the underbrush... and a large tiger springs out, roaring fiercely! It attacks the hunting party, striking at one of the hunters, ripping and tearing flesh before disappearing again into the jungle.
translation: 猎人们穿越了丛林，你希望你能幸运地找到一只老虎。突然，前方的树丛有动静传来……一只猛虎咆哮着跳出了丛林并且开始攻击猎人们。它从你其中一个侍从身上咬下了一块肉，然后消失在丛林之中。

original: Several forward scouts come running back to the main hunting party. In excited whispers, they inform you that a large tiger has been spotted ahead.
translation: 几个斥候跑回来激动地告诉你，在前方发现了一只大老虎。

original: Hand me my spear, and stand back. I will kill it myself.
translation: 把我的长矛拿来，然后退后，我要亲自杀死这只野兽。

original: Bring the soldiers forward, let's corner it and kill it.
translation: 让士兵们往前走，我们把它包围起来，然后杀掉。

original: Stepping forward, you watch the tiger closely, weighing your spear in your hand and waiting for the right moment to strike. The tiger prowls towards you, slowly. Then suddenly, it leaps towards you! You sidestep and stab with your spear, sinking it deeply into its flank.
translation: 你慢慢地向前靠近，紧紧地盯着那只野兽，掂量着你手中长矛的重量，等待着攻击的时机。老虎小心翼翼地向前移动着。突然间，它扑向了你！你侧步躲避并且用你的长矛插入了老虎的侧腹。

original: Stepping forward, you watch the tiger closely, weighing your spear in your hand and waiting for the right moment to strike. The tiger prowls towards you, slowly. Then suddenly, the huge beast stops, looking nervous. It turns and runs into the dense vegetation before you can throw your spear.
translation: 你慢慢地向前靠近，紧紧地盯着那只野兽，掂量着你手中长矛的重量，等待着攻击的时机。老虎小心翼翼地向前移动着。突然间，这只凶猛的野兽停了下来，很紧张地看着你。老虎调转方向，在你投出你的长矛之前向丛林深处逃去。

original: I failed to kill the tiger!

Stepping forward, you watch the tiger closely, weighing your spear in your hand and waiting for the right moment to strike. Then suddenly, the tiger leaps towards you! Surprised, you stumble backwards as it starts to tear at you with claws and teeth. Your soldiers run in, stabbing at the beast, and it decides to retreat, disappearing into the dense vegetation.
translation: 你慢慢地向前靠近，紧紧地盯着那只野兽，掂量着你手中长矛的重量，等待着攻击的时机。突然间，它扑向了你！你吃惊地向后踉跄退去，野兽开始用利爪和牙齿攻击你。你手下的士兵迅速赶来，并捅伤了老虎。老虎决定撤退，消失在丛林深处。

original: The hunting party edges forward, encircling the area and closing on the tiger. The beast discovers the trap too late and tries to run, but the hunters close in from all sides, stabbing with their spears. The tiger roars wildly as its life's blood spills over the ground.
translation: 猎人们前进着，把老虎一点点包围起来。当老虎发现陷阱的时候已经太迟了，尽管它想逃走，但是从不同方向包围的猎人们用他们的长矛刺入老虎。老虎咆哮着，它的鲜血溢出在地上。

original: The hunting party edges forward, encircling the area and closing on the tiger. The beast, however, smells the trap and turns and flees into the dense vegetation. Several soldiers run after it but return shortly after to report that the animal is gone.
translation: 猎人们前进着，把老虎一点点包围起来。这只野兽却嗅到了陷阱，并且逃进了丛林深处。几个士兵跟了上去，但是不一会便返回来报告老虎已经消失在丛林之中。
看起来今天运气不在保佑我们。

original: Finding a wise guru and inviting him to your court would improve your prestige as well as give you the benefits of his sage advice.
translation: 寻找一位渊博的上师并且邀请他来到你的宫廷里去提高你的威望，寻求他贤明的建议。

original: You have sent messengers out in all directions, their mission to try and find a wise guru and convince him to come to your court.
translation: 你向四面八方派出了信使，他们的任务就是找寻一位渊博的上师并劝说他来到你的宫廷。

original: I hope they find such a person.
translation: 我希望他们能找到这样的人物。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], the wise guru [From.GetFirstNameWithNick] has agreed to come and take up residence at your court.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，智慧的[From.GetFirstNameWithNick]上师已经同意来到你的宫廷了。

original: A guru is a wise master or teacher, one who imparts wisdom, usually by giving oral instruction and advice. Having a respected guru residing at your court can be useful, giving you access to sage advice.
translation: 上师是渊博的教师，他会传授你智慧，给你口头传授与建议。有一位令人尊敬的上师在你宫廷里会有很大的好处，能给予你贤明的建议。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], the soldiers are reluctant to follow you to India. They are tired of the combat, pain and glory.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，士兵们不情愿追随你去印度，他们已经厌倦了厮杀，疼痛和荣耀。
尽管如此，他们还是要追随我的。

original: Onward! They will learn to fear us in the East as well!
translation: 前进！他们在东方也会惧怕我们的！

original: Hindus in your realm are insulted
translation: 你王国里的印度教教徒被冒犯了

original: Buddhists in your realm are insulted
translation: 你王国里的佛教徒被冒犯了

original: Jains in your realm are insulted
translation: 你王国里的耆那教徒被冒犯了

original: A Hindu yogi has appeared at your court, seeking audience. He speaks of the many Hindu gods and how to reach for wisdom and power by honoring them and follow the wisdom of the Mahabharata.
translation: 一个印度的瑜伽士到达了你的宫廷，寻找听众。他说了很多关于印度教的神祗，以及如何纪念祂们并遵循摩诃婆罗多的智慧，获得智慧和力量。

original: If you have finished talking, you may leave.
translation: 如果你说完了，你可以走了。

original: I don't need your strange, pathetic demon-gods. Guards, throw him out!
translation: 我对你可悲怪异的邪神不感兴趣。卫兵，把他赶走！

original: The yogi continues to elaborate on the way of ascetism and yoga and how to live a spiritual life through discipline and mediation.
translation: 瑜伽士继续谈到了禁欲主义和瑜伽以及如何通过自律和调节追求精神上的满足。

original: You have convinced me. I too shall embrace yoga and ascetism!
translation: 你说服了我。我也要信奉瑜伽和禁欲主义！

original: You are wise. I shall take up the Hindu faith.
translation: 你很睿智。我会转信印度教。

original: On second thought, this is perhaps not for me.
translation: 又想了想，也许这并不适合我。

original: A Buddhist yogi has appeared at your court, seeking audience. He speaks to you of the ways of the Buddha and of how to reach wisdom by rejecting excess and moderating your desires.
translation: 一个印度的瑜伽士到达了你的宫廷，寻找听众。他告诉你佛陀的行为方式以及如何通过调节你的需求和抛弃掉无节制的生活得到智慧。

original: I don't need your pseudo-philosophy. Guards, throw him out!
translation: 我不需要你那虚假的哲学。卫兵，把他赶走！

original: You have convinced me. It's Buddha time...
translation: 你说服了我。现在是佛陀时间……

original: You are wise. I shall take up the Buddhist faith.
translation: 你很睿智。我会转信佛教。

original: On second thought, this is perhaps not for me.
translation: 又想了想，也许这并不适合我。

original: A naked Jain ascetic has appeared at your court, seeking audience. Sitting before you in the throne room, he criticizes your lifestyle, calls you sinful and speaks to you of the Jain ways of harmony and purity.
translation: 一个裸体的耆那教苦行者到达了你的宫廷，寻找听众。在你的王座前坐下，他批评了你的生活方式，说你罪孽深重，并且告诉你如何通过耆那教的教义获得协调与纯洁。

original: Call me sinful, will you? Guards, take him out and behead him!
translation: 说我罪孽深重？你敢！卫兵，把他拉出去砍了！

original: The naked Jain ascetic continues to elaborate on the way of ascetism and yoga and how to seek spiritual purity through discipline and mediation.
translation: 那个裸体的耆那教苦行僧继续谈到了禁欲主义和瑜伽以及如何通过自律和调节追求灵魂上的纯洁。

original: You have convinced me. I too shall walk naked!
translation: 你说服了我，我也要开始裸体行走！

original: You are wise. I shall take up the Jain faith.
translation: 你很睿智。我会转信耆那教。

original: On second thought, this is perhaps not for me.
translation: 又想了想，也许这并不适合我。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], a huge diamond has been found in a mine in one of your provinces. It is truly one of those stones that are found once every five centuries! The only question now is, of course: what do you wish to do with it?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，在您一个省份的矿井里发现了一个巨大的钻石。这确实是五百年一见的石头啊。现在唯一的问题当然就是，你准备怎么用这块钻石呢？

original: I shall wear it in a magnificent new crown!
translation: 我将把它镶上一个精美绝伦的新王冠！

original: I will hide it in the treasury, where it's safe.
translation: 我会把它保存在国库里，那里面更安全。

original: I will give it to my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife], [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
It's worth a fortune, sell it!
translation: 这颗钻石价值连城，卖掉它！

original: As you sit in your throne room, the huge diamond sparkles in your magnificent crown. It casts a lustrous brilliance over everyone present, a brilliance that echoes in your reputation across the realm.
translation: 当你在王座上坐下的时候，那颗巨大的宝石散耀的光芒，宝石的完美让每个人陶醉其中，你的名声传遍了整个王国。

original: You are riding with a troops of soldiers through a nearby town, returning from inspecting your lands. You are wearing your magnificent crown. Suddenly, someone jumps at you from an overhanging roof and tries to grab your crown. The thief misses, however, and breaks his neck in the fall.
translation: 你和你的士兵们从巡逻你的土地一起归来，策马进城。你戴着你那精美绝伦的王冠。突然间，有人从你头上的房顶跳下，想抢走你的王冠。小偷失手了，并且坠落后摔断了脖子。

original: You are out in the countryside, inspecting forest-clearing work being done by your subjects. You are wearing your magnificent crown. As usual, elephants are employed for the heavy work. The sun catches your huge diamond and it sparkles wildly, blinding a nearby elephant who panics! The animal rampages through your company, injuring several people severely.
translation: 你在郊野外，巡视你臣民做的丛林清理工作。你戴着你那精美绝伦的王冠。和平常一样，大象用来做体力活。太阳照耀着你的钻石，反射出的刺眼光芒让一旁的大象失去了视线。大象在惊吓之中发狂了，冲进了你的随从中，并且让几个人受了重伤。

original: Sleeping in bed at night, you wake to the sound of furtive footsteps. As you sit up, you see [From.GetFullName] in the process of removing your diamond crown from its place near your bed. As you cry out, [From.GetSheHe] pulls a knife and stabs at you. You scream, and moments later your guards enter and seize the thief. Enraged, you order [From.GetHerHim] executed on the spot.
translation: 夜深人静，你已经入睡。你被鬼鬼祟祟的脚步声惊醒，你爬了起来，发现是[From.GetFullName]正在尝试从你的王冠上把钻石取下来。当你哭喊寻求帮助的时候，[From.GetSheHe]拔出一把刀并刺向你。你尖叫着，不一会卫兵们冲了进来并且抓住了这个窃贼。怒火中商的你下令把 [From.GetHerHim]就地处死。

original: This is what happens to thieves and murderers!
translation: 这就是小偷和杀人犯的下场！

original: You are busy ruling your realm, but in your free moments you take a pause to think of that beautiful large diamond that is hidden safe in your treasury. You are certain that no one else in the world has such a precious treasure.
translation: 你把大量时间花在了治理国家上，但是在你独处的时候，你就停下手上的活想着你的精美的钻石，它安全地藏在你的国库里。你很确定这世上没人再有这么精贵的珍宝。

original: Lately, you find yourself spending more and more time in your treasury. You go down there to look at your lovely diamond. It really is lovely. When one has such a treasure, one doesn't need people.\nPeople don't sparkle, they wither and die. Diamonds are forever.
translation: 最近你发现，你发现你花越来越长的时间在你的国库里，你去那里看你的精美的钻石。它是那么完美的。当你有如此珍宝的时候，你不需要你的人民了。\n你的人民不会闪耀，他们生老病死，但钻石恒久远。

original: One day, your guard captain comes before you with grave news: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], something terrible has happened! Thieves broke into your treasury last night and stole the great diamond. Nothing else is missing.'
translation: 这天，侍卫长万分遗憾地告诉你：「尊敬的[Root.GetLordLady]，小偷昨晚潜入金库，偷走了那颗钻石。没有其他损失。」

original: Lately, you have been sleeping badly. You worry about your great diamond. You know it should be safe in the treasury, but when you don't see it you worry. Have you really taken all precautions to keep it safe?
translation: 最近，由于担心那颗钻石，你夜不能寐。虽然你不断安慰自己，钻石存在金库里很安全，但是这是徒劳的。你总是怀疑，自己是否做好了一切保护那颗钻石？

original: Your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] is very pleased with the magnificent diamond. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] keeps it with [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] all the time, relishing the admiration it attracts from everyone who sees it.
translation: 你的[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]对钻石非常满意。[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]一直带在[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]身边，向周围的人炫耀。

original: I am glad [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] likes the gift!

Your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] comes to see you, in tears. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] tells you that the grand diamond that you gave to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] has been stolen while [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] was riding through a market town. There is no trace of the thief.
translation: 你的[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]面带泪痕来见你。[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]告诉你，你给[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]的钻石在[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]骑马的时候遗失了。没有发现任何线索。

original: You are worried about your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]. Lately, [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] mostly sits around in [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] room, fondling [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] great diamond and talking to [Root.Spouse.GetHerselfHimself]. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] doesn't even answer anymore when you try to talk to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim].
translation: 你一直担心着你的[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife][Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]。最近，[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]总是待在[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]房里，把玩[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]那颗钻石，而且对[Root.Spouse.GetHerselfHimself]说着什么。[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]甚至对你对[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]的劝诫也不上心。

original: The captain of your guard comes to see you, sweating, terror in his eyes. He tells you that [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has been murdered on the road, by robbers probably wanting to get their hands on the great diamond! A patrol of soldiers arrived just as the crime was committed, however, killing the robbers and retrieving the treasure.
translation: 侍卫长满头大汗地前来告诉你，[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]死于半道抢劫，强盗试图夺走那颗钻石！幸好，当强盗准备逃跑的时候，一队士兵正好路过，消灭了强盗，取回了钻石。

original: Apart from more serious events, you have found that a lot of little strange, bad things happen around the great diamond. Several servants who have handled it have died. People around whisper and gossip, they say the diamond is cursed and will bring woe on your dynasty. You are beginning to wonder if they may not be right.
translation: 从目前的情况看，那颗钻石似乎会给人带来恶运。几个接触过它的仆人都死了。很多人都说钻石被施了诅咒，它会毁了你自己甚至你的家族。听到这些流言，你开始担心起来。

original: Much as it pains me, I will sell it.
translation: 我已经受够了，把它卖了吧。
直接丢进河里，不让它害人了。

original: I cannot live with it nor without it. I must swallow it and kill myself!
translation: 我不能离开它，我要和它死在一起！

original: You sold the great diamond, but now you find that you really miss it. Maybe if you sent riders after the merchants, you could still get it back.
translation: 卖了钻石后，你感到无比空虚。或许应该派骑兵从商人手里拿回它。

original: The riders you sent after the diamond return. They explain that the merchant who bought the jewel refused to sell it back, and when they insisted a fight broke out. The merchant has been killed but your men managed to retreive the diamond. As things turned out, you got to keep your money as well...
translation: 派出去的骑兵带着钻石回来了。由于商人拒绝交还，他们杀死了商人，夺回了钻石，你准备的钱也没有用出去……

original: I will sleep with it under my pillow.
translation: 我要把它放在枕头下面。

original: You threw the magnificent diamond in the river, but now you miss it terribly. Perhaps it'd still be possible to find if you went and looked?
translation: 你把钻石丢进了河里，但是抑制不住对它的想念。或许该去丢钻石的地方找找？

original: It's not too late to correct my mistake. We will search for it!
translation: 亡羊补牢，现在去找还来得及。

original: You send your men to search the river where you threw the diamond in, but to no avail. Frustrated, you dive in yourself. You wade and swim back and forth, searching for hours, but it's useless, you just can't find it.
translation: 你派出手下把那里搜了个遍，但毫无收获。沮丧的你亲自下河寻找，但也没能找到。

original: One morning when you wake up, you realize that your precious diamond is gone! Someone has stolen it while you were sleeping, from your very bedchamber.
translation: 一天早上你醒来时，突然发现那颗钻石已经没了！有人趁你熟睡，潜入卧室偷走了它。

original: It must have been my wife!
It must have been my own blood who did it!
I know it was someone on my council!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is very upset at your accusation. You hold [From.GetHerHim] in the dungeon while [From.GetHerHim] quarters are searched, but nothing is found. After a while, you start to doubt - perhaps you were mistaken in your suspicion?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对你的指责十分愤怒。你把 [From.GetHerHim]关入地牢，同时搜查[From.GetHerHim]住处，但毫无收获。之后，你开始怀疑，自己是不是搞错了？

original: It seems to me that [From.GetSheHe] is innocent.

My [Root.GetLordLady], there is a mysterious plague on our province of [From.GetName]. Many travellers and caravans have been disappearing, much more than would be a normal toll of robbers, accidents and disease.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，[From.GetName]内发生了奇怪的事情。大路上的旅人和商队都不见了，这不像是强盗或者疾病导致的。

original: The sufferings of commoners are nothing to me.
The agents that we sent out to investigate the unknown menace on the roads have disappeared without trace. We haven't heard from them in months.
translation: 派出去调查神秘失踪事件的手下似乎也没了消息。

original: We must continue our investigations. But send larger, armed parties.
translation: 我们必须继续调查。派出更多军队。

original: Burn farms and hang peasants until the truth comes out.
translation: 把那里的农民找来，不说出实情就烧了房子，吊死他们。

original: Give up, this is clearly hopeless.
translation: 放弃吧，似乎没可能找出真相。

original: We have spread much terror and woe in the countryside, my [Root.GetLordLady], and the peasants now seem sufficiently cowed. However, there is no new information on the mysterious disappearances. It would seem that the peasants really know nothing about it.
translation: 我们的恐吓卓有成效，尊敬的[Root.GetLordLady]，现在那里的农民都被吓傻了。但是关于失踪的真相仍然没有头绪。看来农民的确不清楚情况。

original: Pay them some compensation. We shall try another strategy.
translation: 给他们些补偿。我们试试其他办法。

original: No one is wholly innocent. Now let's forget this matter.
translation: 那里没有人是无辜的。他们吃些苦是应该的。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], the problem of the disappearing caravans persists. Perhaps we should try sending large parties of soldiers to scout after all?
translation: 尊敬的[Root.GetLordLady]，失踪仍在持续。或许我们该派出大军沿途巡逻？

original: Very well, send out armed riders.
No, we will offer a large money reward for information.
translation: 不，我们应该悬赏相关信息。

original: A young traveller has come forward, claiming he has important information about the disappearing caravans. He says he wants the gold reward, but asks to see you personally.
translation: 一个年轻的旅人声称关于失踪事件他有重要的线索，不仅要求赏金，而且要同你单独会面。

original: The young man enters the throne room, looking around cautiously. He looks up and says he has brought good information, then reaches inside his jacket. He pulls out... a throwing knife! He throws it at you, shouting: 'Our Mother Kali will harvest what is hers!' [From.GetFullName] reacts and throws [From.GetHerselfHimself] in front of you, saving your life but sacrificing [From.GetHerHis] own, with a knife through the heart. The strange youth quickly escapes, running past the surprised guards.
translation: 年轻人走进宝座室，小心翼翼的环顾四周。他抬起头，说他带来了好消息，然后将手伸进他的外套。他拔出一把……飞刀！他将它扔向了你，喊到：「我们的母亲迦梨将收获属于她的东西！」[From.GetFullName]反应过来，用[From.GetHerselfHimself]全身力气挡在你面前拯救了你的生命，却牺牲了自己，飞刀刺穿了[From.GetHerHis]心脏。守卫们还惊愕着发生了什么，陌生的青年已经消失无踪。

original: A council is held after the assassination attempt. Your advisors all agree that this menace must be dealt with forcefully.
translation: 行刺事件后，你与阁臣开了一个会。他们都同意必须强硬对付这帮恶徒。

original: No, this is too dangerous. Leave it be.
translation: 不行，这太危险了。由他去吧。

original: Your riders have still not been able to find any clues regarding the attacks, though at least the caravans they accompany in strength are safe. Also, it has been noted that short-range caravans seem to never be attacked in the same way, only the longer-travelling ones. Strange.
translation: 你的手下至今还没有查出任何线索，不过，至少商队在他们的保护下得以安全来往境内。然而，他们发现短途商旅从来不会受到同类的袭击，只有长途商旅会遇袭。这事不简单……

original: Supply military escort to all long range caravans in the province.
translation: 增派部队保护长途商旅。

original: Give it up, this takes up too many resources.
translation: 放弃吧，花费实在太大了。

original: Several months have passed since you ordered large military escorts for all long-range caravans in the province of [From.GetName]. In this time, no caravans have disappeared. Travellers and merchants can once again breathe easily. It still irks you that you will never know who did it. There are rumours, however, of an increased number of disappeared caravans in several neighboring provinces...
translation: 你派兵保护途经[From.GetName]的长途行商已经好几个月了，现在已没有商队失踪的案件发生，行商与旅行终于可以松一口气。但是，你仍一直苦恼着，因为你已经没法知道到底谁是幕后黑手。可是，最近风传在邻近的地区，发生越来越多商队失踪事件……

original: A delegation from your subjects has arrived. Large-scale forest clearing work is being done in one of your provinces. Recent illness among the elephants means the peasants don't have enough of the animals to be able to finish in time before the rainy season. They ask you to lend them elephants to speed up the work.
translation: 你的臣民上奏说：他们正在清理大片的森林开垦田地，然而最近他们的大象都病了，这意味着他们无法赶及在雨季来到前完成。他们想请你借出大象以加快进度。

original: I can't spare my elephants, but I will send soldiers to help.
translation: 我不会派出我的大象，不过我会派些士兵去帮助你们。

original: Your problems are not my concern.
translation: 你们的问题不是我的问题。
你的臣民认为你不重视他们。

original: This character has annoyed the religious authorities. They are not amused.
translation: 这个角色惹恼了宗教权威，他们不会高兴的。
